column1: mary ann jones| mary ann jones
column5: died friday in the wayne memorial hospital. she was born sept. 14
column8: to john and jewels hayes broadway. she is survived her husband steven jones and three children. memorial services will be held wednesday at 10 am in the james t. haskins memorial chapel of the haskins funeral home. the family will receive friends at the residence and will assemble at the funeral home in preparation for the service.
